function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Low margins and financial constraints","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underutilized spare capacity during covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of revenue leading to industry distress","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of permanent demand decrements","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential health risks from conducting humanitarian missions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate employee training and education levels may lead to ineffective delivery of new services, such as online cooking classes and web-based services.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant decrease in demand for air travel and car rental services due to the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagion through handling of ingredients and cooking equipment in multiple households.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tinkering with the demand and supply chain may lead to compromised productive capacity","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusive shopping hours for vulnerable customers may not effectively minimize out-of-stock situations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Service firms may struggle to create new meaning for customers during shelter at home orders","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possibility of virus reemergence leading to reintroduction of shelter-at-home decrees","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overwhelm of system due to demand surges","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of capacity to de-densify small premises leading to limited social distancing measures.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial investments required for strategic partnerships and web design for delivery services.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased inequality and lack of diversity among service organizations due to covid-19 constraints.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding in service venues","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of trust and confidence in service venues","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear and inconsistent social distancing rules and laws","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of enforcement of social distancing rules","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying on internal rules rather than external legal environment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for respiratory droplet transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in managing human interactions in service venues","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social acceptance and legitimacy of businesses in the context of social distancing","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in demand for delivery services due to the pandemic","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective vaccine for covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift towards new normal of social distancing and shelter at home","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uber’s policy of inclusiveness and sharing of information may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shelter at home policies and social distancing challenges have impacted uber’s business model, potentially contributing to the spread of contagion as people seek alternative transportation options.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uber’s decision to deliver food from small restaurants free of charge may lead to increased demand and activity, creating challenges in maintaining safe and hygienic operations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vanishing demand due to shelter at home policies","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for disease transmission through close contact in ridesharing services","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"People staying home and consuming digital content","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial institutions offering educational classes in basic financial literacy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adaptation strategies for service organizations to cope with covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"E-commerce stock outs of essential items like hand sanitizer","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Price gouging by unscrupulous sellers during a pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Highly variable nature of online customer demand","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Medium contact intensity in grocery stores and restaurants","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Online communities and services in gymnasiums","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High contact services operating during a total lockdown","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of online communities for hair salons","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Small family-run businesses without resources to develop online presence","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High degree of physical interaction required for service delivery","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of defined laws and regulations surrounding the spread of covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in transitioning services online","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close physical interaction between service providers and customers","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High degree of interactivity in service delivery","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Online service delivery with no physical interaction","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proactive signals are costly, leading some firms to choose not to adopt an accommodative posture.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
